-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Monitor ekg metrics via Nagios
--   
@package nagios-plugin-ekg
@version 0.1.1.0

module System.Nagios.Plugin.Ekg.Types

-- | Top-level object for parsed EKG metrics. Structurally, this is an
--   n-ary tree; the leaves are the metrics themselves and the non-leaf
--   nodes are used to construct the metric labels.
data MetricTree
instance Eq EkgMetric
instance Show EkgMetric
instance ToPerfData MetricTree
instance FromJSON MetricTree
instance FromJSON MetricNode
instance FromJSON EkgMetric

module System.Nagios.Plugin.Ekg.Check

-- | Run the check against the EKG endpoint specified on the command line.
--   Terminate according to the <a>plugin development guidelines</a> -
--   <a>OK</a> if we retrieve and successfully parse a result, otherwise
--   <tt>CRITICAL</tt>.
checkEkg :: NagiosPlugin ()

-- | Version of <a>checkEkg</a> which takes a <a>ByteString</a> rather than
--   requesting it from an EKG endpoint.
checkEkg' :: ByteString -> NagiosPlugin ()


module System.Nagios.Plugin.Ekg
